Package nablarch.fw.messaging.realtime.http.client

Interface HttpProtocolClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
HttpProtocolBasicClient
@Published(tag="architect") public interface HttpProtocolClient
Http接続用クライアントが実装すべきインターフェース。

    • execute

      HttpResult execute(HttpProtocolClient.HttpRequestMethodEnum httpMethod, String url, Map<String,List<String>> headerInfo, Map<String,String> urlParams, HttpOutputStreamWriter writer, HttpInputStreamReader reader)
      HTTP通信を行う。
      Parameters:
      httpMethod - HTTPメソッド
      url - 接続先
      headerInfo - HttpHeadderに渡す情報
      urlParams - URLパラメータ
      writer - StreamWritter
      reader - OutputStreamReader
      Returns:
      レスポンスコード
